<script>
var t = async_test("TextRendering stays the same after font change.");
_addTest(function(canvas, ctx) {

  ctx.font = '20px serif';
  ctx.textRendering = "optimizeSpeed";
  _assertSame(ctx.textRendering, "optimizeSpeed", "ctx.textRendering", "\"optimizeSpeed\"");
  ctx.font = '10px serif';
  _assertSame(ctx.textRendering, "optimizeSpeed", "ctx.textRendering", "\"optimizeSpeed\"");

});
</script>
